channel.title: Need help with Error_game_crash
channel.description:
ever this the last fucking update(the sever change thingy one) when ever i log in after about 10 seccons i get logged out and get sent this msg:
Error_game_crash - A problem has occured whilst running the game. This game has encountered a problem and cannot continue running.
We strive for our games to work on as many computers as possible and be free of bugs.
If you are able to reproduce this problem (i.e. it always occurs when you do a certain thing), then please submit a bug report via our website, and we will try to fix it as soon as possible.
If problems persist then please refer to our technical FAQ which can be found in the FAQ section of our website.
this is the responce i get
From: Jagex Subject: Re: Bug Report - error again -.- Date: 22 May 2006 14:59
Permanently delete this message Delete
Dear <myusernamehere>,
Thank you for your message.
Flush the cache of your browser before loading our web site again. You can do this by selecting "option" under the "Tools" menu in your browser.
If that doesn't work, then you need to update your Java runtime environment.
Download and install the lastest version of Java RE from the Sun web site.
Contact technical support for further assistance.
Click on 'Customer Support' under the Information and Advice section on our web site.
Select the technical question link.
Sincerely, RuneScape QA
The contents of this message are strictly confidential and are intended only for the owner of the account to which it was sent. The contents of this message must not be disclosed to any other person or copies taken.
iv cleared a fucking cache over 30 fucking times and shit pure shit can any one help me out here ?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!
